title: Knife, ca. 1735–40
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Blade slightly curved upper edge, lower edge tapering towards the point. Plain silver ferrule. Tapering octagonal white porcelain handle decorated with kakiemon design in yellow, blue and green (underglaze) and brown-red (overglaze). Rounded silver cap at the top of the handle.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1735–40.
ca. 1735–40. Porcelain, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-231.
